entry.title: Du Du Drops - Homeopathic remedy to help children sleep naturally
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Homeopathic Remedy Tincture
Price: 121.50

Du Du Drops is a safe and effective homeopathic remedy specially formulated by a Clinical Psychologist to calm and relax toddlers and young children and induce a state of drowsiness. Use from 1 year up. (Note Babies 0 - 12 months use Sleepy Sprinkles)

  • Top Selling all-natural sleep remedy for babies & children
  • Formulated by a Clinical Psychologist to help children sleep
  • Prevents night time behavioural problems & restores healthy, regular sleep patterns
  • Relaxes & calms your child & promotes natural, peaceful sleep
  • Also assists with sleep problems caused by teething

Ingredients

Chamomilla (6C), Cina (30C), Coffea (30C), Pulsatilla (6C)

Directions

Dilute 5 drops in a teaspoon of milk or water just before bedtime or add to the bedtime bottle. May be repeated after 15 minutes if necessary or during the night up to 5 doses.

For babies younger than 12 months: Use Sleepy Sprinkles

Children over 12 years: Use Feelgood Health's Serenite Plus Drops for teenagers and adults.

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.
entry.s:tag: Homeopathic remedy to help children sleep
Natural remedy to help children fall asleep

entry.title: Sceletium Capsules: Traditional Natural Mood Tonic | Big Tree
entry.summary:
Vendor: Absolute Organics
Type: Supplements
Price: 121.00

Big Tree's Sceletium Capsules (60 vegetarian capsules) are a traditional African mood tonic.

  • Sceletium has a long history of use in African Traditional Medicine
  • Elevates mood, acts as a natural anti-depressant and decreases anxiety, stress and tension
  • Also useful as a drug & alcohol withdrawal aid. Sceletium is known to reduce addictive cravings particularly with regard to nicotine and also lessens the withdrawal effects of alcohol and other addictive drugs
  • Enhances the immune response and acts as an adaptogen (similar in action to the Chinese herb Astragalus membranaceous)
  • Vegan & vegetarian friendly (veggie capsule)
  • Free of corn, yeast, wheat, soy, salt, sugar and dairy products and formulated without preservatives, artificial colours or flavours.

Ingredients

BigTree Sceletium Capsules contain only: ﻿100% pure Sceletium tortuosum 100mg

Inactive Ingredients: Microcrystalline cellulose, Silicone dioxide, Magnesium Stearate

Directions for use

Dosage: take 1 capsule twice daily or as directed by a healthcare practitioner.

Contraindications and Side Effects

Although there have been no confirmed reports of drug interactions, the neuro-receptor activities of Sceletium suggest that there may be interactions with other psychiatric medications and cardiac drugs. People taking any psychiatric drugs (including all anti-anxiety drugs, sedatives, hypnotics, anti-psychotics and antidepressants, including MAO inhibitors, and particularly SSRI's) are advised to not take Sceletium-containing products.

Please consult your health care professional before replacing any pharmaceutical antidepressant with Sceletium. When used at the recommended dose there are no documented side-effects. In large doses Sceletium can cause euphoria, but this is easily managed by reducing the dose. Do not use during pregnancy or while breastfeeding.

    Note: Consult your doctor if symptoms persist or worsen.

      Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: PureCalm - Natural remedy soothes anxiety, stress & reduces panic attacks
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

PureCalm is a natural herbal remedy, developed by a Clinical Psychologist, to soothe the symptoms of anxiety, stress and panic attacks. It offers fast on-the-spot relief when needed. (50 ml)

  • Formulated by a Clinical Psychologist
  • Helps with nervous stress & tension
  • Calms & reduces anxiety and panic attacks
  • Soothes the nerves
  • Reduces symptoms of OCD
  • Excellent companion remedy to MindSoothe Capsules

Ingredients

PureCalm is formulated according to the principles of Whole Herb Technology, staying true to the Full Spectrum manufacturing principles of herbal medicine. The 100% natural herbal ingredients of PureCalm are: 

    Melissa officinalis (Lemon Balm), Lavandula augustifolia (Lavender), 
    Passiflora incarnata (Passion Flower), Ethanol (inactive ingredient)

    Directions

    PureCalm comes in convenient concentrated tincture (drop) form and is diluted in water or juice. 

    Dosage:

    Adults: Dilute 15 drops in about 1/4 cup water or juice three times daily or when needed.

    Children over 6 years: One drop per age year of the child

    Caution: Safety during pregnancy and breastfeeding has not been established. Please consult your doctor should symptoms persist

entry.title: Abundance Oil Potion - Attracts All Good Things Into Your Life
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pure Indigenous
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 64.50

Pure Indigenous's Abundance Potion (20 ml) has been created from a selection of South African essential oils mixed in organically certified cold pressed Grape Seed oil to attract an abundance of all things good into your life.

  • Brings upon a state of relaxation
  • Opens your body's energy centres to receive blessings
  • Balances your thoughts and emotions
  • Promotes positive thinking
  • Gets rid of negative energy internally and externally

Ingredients

  • African Wormwood Essential Oil (Artemisia Afra), also known as wild wormwood, African wormwood, wilde-als and zengana, is believed to have magical properties.
  • Cape Chamomile Essential Oil (Eriocephalus punctulatus) soothes, heals and relaxes the body and mind. It's also a great medicinal treatment for tension in the muscles.
  • Rose Geranium Essential Oil (Pelagonium Graveolens) is known as the poor people’s Rose oil as it is less expensive than the original Rose essential oil. It's been used for centuries as a wound healer, to balance energies, to enhance moods, treat various skin ailments and last but not least, for its aromatic scents.
  • African Lemon Bush Essential Oil (Lippia Javanica) also known as Koorsbossie/Lemoenbossie and Fever Tea/Lemon Bush/Cape Verbena, is a is one of the most fresh-smelling oils that stimulates brain functioning, sharpens cognitive functions, uplifts moods and is used to cleanse auras.
  • Cape Grape Seed Oil has been used for thousands of years due to its benefits of toning the skin, protecting against sun damage, and reducing the appearance of blemishes, wrinkles, and stretch marks.

Directions for use

You can use the Abundance Potion as an Aromatherapy massage oil, to rub onto temples, use as a burner oil, in the bath or as a steam inhalation.

Caution: Essential oils are not recommended during pregnancy, breastfeeding or on babies/children.
entry.s:tag: Pure Indigenous Wholesale Distributor South Africa

entry.title: Luck Oil Potion - Attracts Blessings & Good Luck
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pure Indigenous
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 41.50

Pure Indigenous's Luck Potion (20 ml) combines myth and magic, based on traditional use by our people and their powers ascribed to African folklore. This potion been mixed in organically certified cold pressed Grape Seed oil from the Cape to draw blessings and good luck.

  • Helps calm and soothe your mind
  • Allows you to acknowledge your abundance of blessings already present in your life
  • Balances your energy to allow a gateway opening for more gifts and good luck

Ingredients

  • African Helichrysum Essential Oil (Helichrysum Odoratissimum) is derived from the Greek word "helios" meaning sun and "chrysos" meaning gold, referring to the colour of the flowers in this genus. It has been used by the indigenous people throughout time in their rituals to cleanse energy and space, as well as bring upon a meditative state.
  • Cape Chamomile Essential Oil (Eriocephalus punctulatus) soothes, heals and relaxes the body and mind. It acts as a powerful anti-inflammatory with a mild sedative effect.
  • Rose-scented Geranium Essential Oil (Pelagonium Graveolens) is known as the poor people’s Rose oil as it is less expensive than the original Rose essential oil. The plant is indigenous to the Cape Province of South Africa and is extracted from the flowers. It's been used for centuries as a wound healer, to balance energies, to enhance moods and last but not least, for its sweet aromatic scents.
  • Cape Grape Seed Oil has been used for thousands of years due to its benefits of toning the skin, protecting against sun damage, and reducing the appearance of blemishes, wrinkles, and stretch marks.

Directions for use

You can use the Luck Potion as an Aromatherapy massage oil, to rub onto temples, use as a burner oil, in the bath or as a steam inhalation.

Caution: Essential oils are not recommended during pregnancy, breastfeeding or on babies/children.
entry.s:tag: Pure Indigenous Wholesale Distributor South Africa

entry.title: Triple Complex NicoTonic - Stay calm during nicotine withdrawal
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 121.50

Triple Complex NicoTonic combines bio-chemic tissue salts chosen to support the nervous system. It is especially beneficial for people who are trying to give up smoking as it helps to soothe the nerves and reduce the restlessness and irritability associated with nicotine withdrawal. 

  • Helps you stop smoking and reduces the 'short fuse' syndrome (frequently associated with nicotine withdrawal)
  • Promotes the bio-availability of nutrients, hormones and bio-chemicals that are usually depleted by the stress of nicotine and drug withdrawal
  • Helps to prevent headaches, irritability, temper outbursts and restlessness
  • Ensures a calmer and more successful path to a cigarette free life!
  • Safe for use by all ages, including during pregnancy
  • Formulated by a Clinical Psychologist

Ingredients

Triple Complex NicoTonic contains the following selected biochemic tissue salts:

Nat phos (D6), Kali phos (D6), Nat mur (D6), Lactose (inactive ingredient)

    Directions

    Triple Complex NicoTonic comes in small sucking tablets which are placed under the tongue to dissolve.

    Dosage:
    First few weeks of stopping smoking: Use as a daily supplement. Dissolve 2 tablets under the tongue or chew in the mouth three times daily. During times of stress or when withdrawal symptoms are acute, the frequency of dosage can be increased to up to every 30 minutes.

    After the first few weeks: Use first thing in the morning and then as needed throughout the day

    Note: Because tissue salts improve cellular functioning and assist with absorption, they are frequently recommended as companion remedies to other natural medicines, such as Feelgood Health MindSoothe and Crave-Rx.

      Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.
entry.s:tag: Natural remedy to help nicotine withdrawal

entry.title: Nat Sulph Tissue Salt No.11 - Detox, Liver Tonic & Water Eliminator (180 tablets)
entry.summary:
Vendor: AllisOne
Type: Tissue Salts
Price: 115.00

AllisOne's Natrum Sulphuricum (180 tablets) is an effective fluid and toxin eliminator that supports the function of the colon, hepato-biliary and lymphatic systems. 

  • Indicated for morning-afters, morning sickness and cellulite
  • counteract the effects of overindulgence (food and alcohol)
  • Promotes the excretion of excess fluid during the treatment of substance abuse and weight-loss
  • Helps with Metabolic Syndrome (sugar metabolic stress)
  • Reduces hot sweats & water retention
  • Assists in the treatment of jaundice
  • Lactose and sugar free (suitable for Vegans, Diabetics, children and animals)

Ingredients

Nat Sulph D6.

Directions for use

Tissue salts may be taken preventatively, as well as for acute and chronic conditions, according to dosage.

  • Adults and Children: Chew or dissolve one tablet in the mouth twice a day
  • Babies & toddlers: One tablet a day (may be crushed & added to food or a bottle) 
  • Acute conditions: Take one tablet every 1/2 hour until symptoms subside
entry.s:tag: AllisOne Wholesale Distrubutor in South Africa

entry.title: Crave-Rx - Naturally reduces cravings during nicotine & drug withdrawal
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

Crave-Rx is a natural herbal remedy to assist with cravings associated with nicotine and drug withdrawal. Help yourself to kick the habit naturally!
  • Helps to reduce the physical craving for nicotine and other drugs
  • Helps to prevent depression, restlessness and anxiety often associated with nicotine and drug withdrawal
  • Stops sugar cravings and compensatory eating
  • Prevents demotivating weight gain and helps to burn fat
  • Reduces 'mental fog', concentration and memory problems associated with nicotine and drug withdrawal

Ingredients

Crave-Rx contains the following ingredients in our unique concentrated 100% herbal formula, manufactured according to Whole Herb Technology: ﻿

Avena sativa, Garcinia cambogia, Gotu Cola (Centella asiatica), Ethanol (inactive ingredient)

Directions

Crave-Rx comes in a convenient concentrated tincture form. Simply dilute drops in a little water or juice and drink!

From the first 3 - 6 weeks, use Crave-Rx Drops every four hours to prevent nicotine craving. Thereafter, use Crave-Rx Drops when needed to control nicotine cravings and ensure balanced mood.

Dosage:
15 drops in approximately 1/4 glass of water, juice or milk every four hours or as needed.

Caution:

Safety during pregnancy and breastfeeding has not been established.

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: JuniorSlim - Effective herbal slimming drops for children & pre-teens
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

JuniorSlim is a complex herbal remedy especially developed by a qualified Clinical Psychologist to address the emotional as well as the physiological causes of overeating and weight gain in children, without affecting their growth and development.
  • Helps to prevent weight gain in children
  • Promotes weight loss while maintaining normal growth and development
  • Maintains a healthy digestive system & promotes healthy metabolism
  • Supports optimum functioning of the liver, kidneys and spleen
  • Promotes overall systemic health in growing children

Ingredients

JuniorSlim contains the following ingredients in our unique concentrated 100% herbal formula, manufactured according to Whole Herb Technology: 

Foeniculum vulgare (Fennel), Mentha piperita, Taraxacum officinale (Dandelion), Astragalus membranaceous (Huang Qi), Glycorrhiza glabra (Licorice), Stachys officinalis (Wood betony), Melissa officinalis, Ethanol (inactive ingredient)

Directions

JuniorSlim is ideally suited to children between the age of 3 and 12. Use one drop per age year of the child in approximately 1/4 glass of water or juice. Repeat two to three times daily before meals. It is recommended that JuniorSlim be combined with regular exercise and a healthy diet for best results.

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Detox Drops - Natural herbal detoxification remedy to cleanse & detox the system
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

Detox Drops contains selected herbal ingredients to cleanse & detox the system, while improving liver & kidney functioning.  
  • Helps to eliminate toxins & improve liver functioning
  • Stimulates bile production and the breakdown of dietary fat
  • Helps the body to recover after overeating or too much 'partying'
  • Boosts the effectiveness of Weight Management Programs 
  • Increases energy and stamina, reduces fatigue, listnessness, pain and headaches caused by toxin buildup

Ingredients

Detox Drops contain the following ingredients in our unique concentrated 100% herbal formula, manufactured according to Whole Herb Technology: ﻿

Taraxacum officinalis (Dandelion),  Foeniculum vulgare (Fennel), Pelargonium reniforme, Ethanol (inactive ingredient)

Directions 

Take 15 drops in app. 1/4 glass water three times daily for 6 weeks. Follow up with a 5 day course every three months or whenever your system feels sluggish and rundown.

NB: Make sure to drink at least 8 glasses of water every day while taking Detox Drops. If you do not drink enough water, you will become dehydrated and your body will not be able to flush out the toxins effectively.

Caution: Fennel and Dandelion should not be used in conjunction with any other diuretic medication such as Lasix or hydro-chlorothiazide. Not recommended during pregnancy or breastfeeding.

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.
entry.s:tag: Herbal drops to clean the blood

entry.title: Sleepy Sprinkles - Natural homeopathic sleep remedy safe for babies
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Homeopathic Remedy Granules
Price: 121.50

Sleepy Sprinkles is a safe and effective 100% homeopathic remedy formulated by a Clinical Psychologist to gently support relaxation and induce a state of drowsiness in infants from newborn to 12 months.  
  • Natural sleep remedy for babies from 0 - 12 months
  • Safely soothes and calms babies into peaceful slumber without the risk of synthetic drugs
  • Assists with sleep problems caused by teething and colic
  • Helps babies feel relaxed and more secure in their immediate surroundings
  • Helps establish healthy, regular sleeping patterns
  • Formulated for babies by a Clinical Psychologist
  • For babies and young children older than 12 months, please see Feelgood Health Du Du Drops.

Ingredients

Sleepy Sprinkles contains the following 100% active homeopathic ingredients in baby-safe therapeutic dosage:

Aconite (30C),  Cina (6C),  Chamomilla (6C), Pulsatilla (6C), Sucrose (inactive ingredient)

Sleepy Sprinkles contains no gluten, artificial flavours, colours or preservatives. 

Our products are animal-cruelty free. Individual ingredients are well-researched and are natural, safe and effective.

Directions for use

Directions: Sprinkle a small pinch of Sleepy Sprinkles directly into your baby's mouth 5 minutes before bedtime or during the night if baby wakes up and fusses. May be repeated after 15 minutes if necessary or during the night for up to 5 doses. For toddlers older than 1 year old, see Feelgood Health DuDu Drops.

Caution: Always consult a doctor or health professional if you are concerned or need advice about your baby’s health. Keep this and all medicines out of reach of children.

Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness. Please consult your veterinarian if symptoms persist.
entry.s:tag: Homeopathic remedy to help babies sleep
Natural remedy to help babies sleep

entry.title: Serenite Plus: Natural herbal insomnia remedy relaxes & helps you sleep
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

Serenite Plus is a combination herbal/homeopathic formula especially formulated by a Clinical Psychologist to treat the symptoms of insomnia, especially sleep onset insomnia (difficulty falling asleep) and occasional insomnia (i.e. difficulty falling asleep not more than two or three times a week). 

  • Treats the symptoms of intermittent, sleep onset insomnia
  • Assists in the treatment of chronic insomnia and sleep maintenance problems
  • Quickly induces a state of drowsiness and deep relaxation
  • Relieves night time anxiety, worry and stress
  • Avoids addiction caused by prescription sleeping medication
  • Formulated by a Clinical Psychologist for safety & effectiveness

Ingredients

Serenite Plus is formulated according to the principles of Whole Herb Technology, staying true to the Full Spectrum manufacturing principles of herbal medicine. The 100% natural herbal and homeopathic ingredients of Serenite Plus are: 

    Avena sativa, Scuttelaria laterifolia, Passiflora incarnata, Coffea (30C),  Nux Vom (30C), Ethanol (inactive ingredient)

    Directions

    Serenite Plus comes in convenient concentrated tincture (drop) form and is diluted in water or juice. 

    Dosage:
    Adults and Teenagers over 12: 15 to 20 drops five minutes before bedtime. May be repeated during the night.
    Children: See Feelgood Health Sleepy Sprinkles (newborn to one year) or Du Du Drops (1 year +)

    Caution: Safety during pregnancy and breastfeeding has not been clinically established. 

          Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.
